page.title: 09How We Spend Our Time
page.content: This is a typical school day for 7 year olds.They get up at 08.00.School starts at 09.00 and in the meantime the children have a breakfast of cereals and then walk to school.The first school session lasts until 10.35 .Activities here include writing their news, number work and language skills.The children have a break of 20 mins. during which they play games or act.The second session lasts from 10.55 to 12.00 when they finish for lunch.Most eat packed lunches from home.Afternoon school begins at 13.10. Here the chidren frequently choose their activities.A 15 minute break is taken at 14.40 and the school day concludes with storytime until 15.30. After school most children play with friends in the garden until the evening meal at 17.00 or 18.00.The day finishes by watching t.v. until 21.00.
